title: Chest Pain - Basic Workup
text: For adults with non-traumatic chest pain and suspected cardiac origin, consider ECG, CBC, lipid profile, and cardiac enzymes if red-flag symptoms are present. Always correlate with clinical judgement.

title: Fever - Initial Evaluation
text: For fever without localizing symptoms, initial workup may include CBC, urine analysis, and basic metabolic panel. Tailor further tests based on history and examination.

title: Diabetes Follow-up
text: In stable type 2 diabetes follow-up visits, consider HbA1c every 3 months, fasting plasma glucose, and lipid profile annually.
